documentation.description: Performs a speed test on a repository

blob_count.description: Number of blobs to create during the test

concurrency.description: Number of operations to run concurrently during the test

seed.description: Seed for the random number generator used to create the test workload

max_blob_size.description: Maximum size of a blob to create during the test, e.g '1gb' or '100mb'

master_timeout.description: Explicit operation timeout for connection to master node
